frontmatter.title: Using ES2015 with Angular today
frontmatter.summary: One of the most exciting upcoming changes for Angular version 2.0.0 is that it's entirely written in ES2015 - the next version of JavaScript. There's no need to wait until Angular version 2.0.0 though. You can start writing your Angular apps with ES20152015 today - even with Angular 1.x. In this post we are going to look at two very exciting ES2015 features and how they can play a role in the context of an Angular application. Modules and Inheritance.
